long_description:
# mcl_spikes

Spikes for VoxeLibre. Useful for automatic farms.
Add:
* Wooden spikes
* Iron spikes
* Diamond spikes
name: mcl_spikes
short_description: Adds wooden, iron and diamon spikes in VoxeLibre.
title: VoxeLibre Spikes
